referenceObject.reference: Crespo, L. C., Silva, I., Enguídanos, A., Cardoso, P. & Arnedo, M. A. (2021a). Integrative taxonomic revision of the woodlouse-hunter spider genus Dysdera (Araneae: Dysderidae) in the Madeira archipelago with notes on its conservation status.
